sentences.en: But on the few occasions when this had happened he could never think of anything to say and he suffered agonies of embarrassment at his dumbness.
sentences.cn: 但在少数场合，当这种情况发生时，他却根本想不起说什么话来，对于自己的垭口无言感到极大的苦恼和困惑。

sentences.en: His dumbness means that he isn't interest in this kind of things.
sentences.cn: 他的沉默表明他对这种事情不感兴趣.

sentences.en: In particular, the dumbness would appear to be aggravated by stress.
sentences.cn: 特别是, 压力会让沉默变得更为严重.

sentences.en: Sometimes, Angela might still feel sad, missing her parents, feeling lonely, hating her dumbness or something.
sentences.cn: 有时，安琪拉可能仍然失踪感到悲伤的时候，她的父母，觉得孤独，那恨他的沉默或什么的。

sentences.en: That is why dumbness is most often the highest expression of happiness of unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 因此沉默往往是幸福或不幸的最高表现形式。

sentences.en: We regard her dumbness as the acknowledgment.
sentences.cn: 我们把她的沉默看作是同意.

words.tran_cn: 哑的，无说话能力的；不说话的，无声音的
